name: Tower of Time (itch) (Juice)
description:
Story

It's the year 1273 A.D. and a curse has been cast upon the Tower of Time by the dark lich Timekeeper that sucks out the life force of everyone that enters the tower. Now it's your time to ascend the tower and send the Timekeeper back to hell and free the tower from it's curse!

Features
  • Interesting time-based gameplay elements
  • 15 unique and challenging randomly-generated floors akin to classic roguelikes
  • A wide variety of different equipment, including rare ancient artifacts with special effects
  • 3 bosses
  • Saving and high scores to compare to others and minmax
Controls KeyKeyboardControllerAFABDBSelectLeft ShiftSelect/BackStartEnterStartD-PadArrow KeysLeft Thumbstick/D-Pad
